info.title: Asana
info.description: Asana enables teams to manage their projects and tasks in one place.

get.description: Triggers when a new project is created.

parameters.name: workspace
parameters.description: Workspace to monitor for new projects.

get.x-ms-trigger-hint: To see it work now, create a new project.

get.description: Triggers when a new task is created.

parameters.name: workspace
parameters.description: Workspace to monitor for new projects.

get.x-ms-trigger-hint: To see it work now, create a new task.

get.description: Triggers when an existing task is completed.

parameters.name: workspace
parameters.description: Workspace to monitor for new projects.

get.x-ms-trigger-hint: To see it work now, create a new task.

get.description: This operation is used to list workspaces for the current user.
This operation is used to view teams in the workspace or organization.
This operation is used to list projects for the current user.

parameters.name: workspace
parameters.description: Workspace to monitor for new projects.

post.description: This operation is used to create a new project.

parameters.name: workspace
parameters.description: Workspace to use for new projects.

parameters.name: team
parameters.description: If creating in an organization, the specific team to create the project in.

get.description: This operation retrieves project object by Project ID.
This operation returns a list of tasks for a specified project.

parameters.name: workspace
parameters.description: Workspace to monitor for new projects.

post.description: This operation is used to create a new task in your Asana project.

parameters.name: workspace
parameters.description: Workspace to use for your projects.

get.description: This operation retrieves a task object by Task ID.

put.description: This operation is used to mark an existing task as complete.

post.description: This operation is used to add a comment to an existing task.

text.description: Text to be used as comment.

get.description: This operation retrieves the list of users for a given workspace.
This operation retrieves user object by User ID.
Triggers when a new project is created (V2).

parameters.name: workspace
parameters.description: Workspace to monitor for new projects.

get.x-ms-trigger-hint: To see it work now, create a new project.

get.description: Triggers when a new task is created (V2).

parameters.name: workspace
parameters.description: Workspace to monitor for new projects.

get.x-ms-trigger-hint: To see it work now, create a new task.

get.description: Triggers when an existing task is completed (V2).

parameters.name: workspace
parameters.description: Workspace to monitor for new projects.

get.x-ms-trigger-hint: To see it work now, create a new task.

get.description: This operation is used to list workspaces for the current user (V2).
This operation is used to view teams in the workspace or organization (V2).
This operation is used to list projects for the current user (V2).

parameters.name: workspace
parameters.description: Workspace to monitor for new projects.

post.description: This operation is used to create a new project (V2).

parameters.name: workspace
parameters.description: Workspace to use for new projects.

parameters.name: team
parameters.description: If creating in an organization, the specific team to create the project in.

get.description: This operation retrieves project object by Project ID (V2).
This operation returns a list of tasks for a specified project (V2).

parameters.name: workspace
parameters.description: Workspace to monitor for new projects.

post.description: This operation is used to create a new task in your Asana project (V2).

parameters.name: workspace
parameters.description: Workspace to use for your projects.

get.description: This operation retrieves a task object by Task ID (V2).

put.description: This operation is used to mark an existing task as complete (V2).

post.description: This operation is used to add a comment to an existing task (V2).

text.description: Text to be used as comment.

get.description: This operation retrieves the list of users for a given workspace (V2).
This operation retrieves user object by User ID (V2).

ProjectRequest.description: An Asana project used to create new projects.

data.description: An Asana project used to create new projects.

name.description: Name of the project.

public.description: True if the project is public to the organization.

color.description: Color used to display the project.

archived.description: Archived projects do not show in the UI by default.

TaskRequest.description: An Asana task used to create new tasks.

data.description: An Asana task used to create new tasks.

name.description: Name of the task.

assignee.description: 'Email or User ID, defaults to current user.

completed.description: Indicate if the task will be marked as completed.

AddCommentResponse.description: A comment on an Asana task.

data.description: A comment on an Asana task.

created_at.description: The date and time at which this comment was created.

source.description: The component of the Asana product the user used to trigger the comment.

type.description: The type of comment this is.

id.description: Globally unique ID of the team.

name.description: The name of the team.
Workspace name.

color.description: The color status of the project.

id.description: ID of the author of the project status.

name.description: Name of the author of the project status.

Projects.description: The projects with which this task is associated.

id.description: The ID of the project with which this task is associated.

name.description: The name of the project with which this task is associated.

id.description: The ID of the project member.

name.description: The name of the project member.

id.description: The ID of the project follower.

name.description: The name of the project follower.

id.description: The ID of the project owner.

name.description: The name of the project owner.

Assignee.description: The user to whom this task is assigned.

Target.description: The task that this comment is associated with.

id.description: The ID of the task that this comment is associated with.

name.description: The ID of the task that this comment is associated with.

CreatedBy.description: The user that authored this comment.

id.description: The ID of the user that authored this comment.

name.description: The name of the user that authored this comment.
